name: 辛西娅·斯科特
awards: 1984年 第56届奥斯卡金像奖 最佳纪录短片 五点十五分的弗拉门戈舞
name_full: 辛西娅·斯科特 Cynthia Scott

last_movies.title: 五点十五分的弗拉门戈舞

introduction: Cynthia Scott (born January 1, 1939) RCA, is an Oscar and Canadian Film Award winning filmmaker who has produced, directed, written and edited several films with the National Film Board of Canada. She is a member of the Royal Canadian Academy of Arts.[1] She is married to filmmaker John N. Smith.[2] Her work with the NFB is mainly focused on documentary filmmaking. Some of Scott's most notable documentaries for the NFB feature dancing and the dance world including Flamenco at 5:15 (1983), which won an Academy Award for Documentary Short at the 56th Academy Awards in 1984.[3]
